event.title: hologram sticker in chennai
event.description: Established in 1999 we took less than 5 years to reach out to the whole of India. Today we are one of the most reliable and economical “High Security Hologram Manufacturers” in the country. Head Quartered in Chennai out presence spans the entire nation through our Marketing divisions located in the various commercial hubs. The dynamic management of Mr. Shanthi Kumbhat, Mr. Sanjay Kumbhat and advisory service of Mr. Ajit Kumbhat we have targeted a turnover of 60Million for the forthcoming year. Over the past five years Kumbhat Holographics has achieved a growth rate of over 40% each year.With a production capacity of 500 million holograms per month and a sprawling manufacturing and R&D unit spread over 72,000 sq.ft. we see expansion as no constraint. Our objective is to produce Holograms at the most economic prices so that every industry small or big is able to protect the interest of consumer and the public.
